DOC.brief_title: DLBS1449 Diabetic Patients With Low HDL
DOC.detailed_description: There three group treatment dosage regimen study . Eligible subject randomize receive follow regimen : 1 ) DLBS1449 dose 1 x 75 mg daily , 2 ) DLBS1449 dose 1 x 150 mg ( two capsule DLBS1449 75 mg ) daily ; 3 ) placebo , daily . Study medication administer daily , even meal , eight week . Clinical laboratory examination evaluate investigational drug 's efficacy safety perform baseline interval four week 8-week course therapy .
DOC.criteria: Male female 21 70 year . Have diagnose diabetes mellitus treated lifestyle intervention least 1 month prior screening , without antidiabetic agent . HDLcholesterol level < 35 mg/dL . Triglycerides level < 200 mg/dL . Adequate liver renal function . Statin and/or fenofibrate therapy regularly take > =3 month stable dose ( ONLY subject currently statin and/or fenofibrate therapy ) . Able take oral medication . Pregnant breastfeed woman willing pregnant . Symptomatic congestive heart failure , unstable angina pectoris , cardiac arrhythmia . Uncontrolled hypertension ( SBP > 160 mmHg and/or DBP > 100 mmHg ) . Any disease state , include chronic/acute systemic infection , uncontrolled illness chronic disease , judge investigator , could interfere trial participation trial evaluation . Concurrent treatment systemic corticosteroid herbal ( alternative ) medicine . Known allergic hypersensitive drug contain similar active substance study medication . Participation clinical study within 30 day prior screen .
